name: OR_LOG_CASE_TIMES
description: The OR_LOG_CASE_TIMES table contains OR management system log timing information.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log referred to by the case times.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the tracking event in the surgical log.

columns.name: TRACKING_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which lists the event being tracked within your facility for the surgical log.
entries: DRK REALLY LONG TITLE LIKE SUPER LONG YOU GUYS LIKE YOU WON'T REALLY BELIEVE HOW LONG

columns.name: TRACKING_TIME_IN
columns.description: The date and time at which the patient was moved into the corresponding item in the event column in the surgical log.

columns.name: TRACKING_TIME_OUT
columns.description: The date and time at which the patient was moved out of the corresponding item in the event column in the surgical log.

columns.name: TRACKING_TIME_ELPS
columns.description: The total amount of time in seconds for the event in the surgical log.

columns.name: TRACK_EVENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category indicating the type of event, whether preop, intraop, or postop.

columns.name: TRACKING_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value indicating the progress status that corresponds to this timing event.

columns.name: TRACKING_STAT_INST
columns.description: The instant at which the status took effect.

columns.name: TRACKING_PAT_LOCATION_EVNT_ID
columns.description: The patient location that triggered this event to be documented.

columns.name: TRACKING_LOCATION_ID
columns.description: The patient location that the patient was moved to when a patient location change triggered the event.

columns.name: INTERVAL_EVENT_UPDATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant of update for a case tracking event.
